title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1476/94 of 27 June 1994 fixing the reference prices for hybrid maize and hybrid sorghum for sowing for the 1994/95 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1476/94 of 27 June 1994 fixing the reference prices for hybrid maize and hybrid sorghum for sowing for the 1994/95 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1994/95 marketing year, the reference prices for hybrid maize and hybrid sorghum for sowing falling within CN codes 1005 10 11, 1005 10 13, 1005 10 15 and 1007 00 10 shall be as set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 246, 5. 11. 1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 303, 10. 12. 1993, p. 9.
(3) OJ No L 168, 26. 7. 1972, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 171, 28. 6. 1986, p. 3.
